name: Luxury Bakery
unlockCondition: Master Baker qualification, access to fine ingredients (sugar, spices)
calculationsAnalysis: The Luxury Bakery produces high-value pastries for a discerning clientele. Higher construction costs reflect finer equipment and decor. Income is substantial due to premium pricing, though input costs (flour, sugar) are also higher. Employs highly skilled pastry chefs.
shortDescription: Creates exquisite pastries and baked sweets for the affluent.
fullDescription: A Luxury Bakery caters to the refined tastes of Venice's elite, producing delicate pastries, cakes, and sweetmeats. These establishments use high-quality ingredients like fine flour and imported sugar, showcasing the baker's artistry.
flavorText: Where flour and sugar are transformed by art into fleeting moments of pure delight.

soundDesign.ambientSound: Gentle oven sounds, delicate mixing, hushed conversations
soundDesign.activitySounds: Intricate decoration work, careful packaging, polite customer service

seasonalEffects.carnival: Specialty carnival pastries and masks made of sugar
